00051 static void initData(ModifierData *md)
00052 {
00053     BevelModifierData *bmd = (BevelModifierData*) md;
00054 
00055     bmd->value = 0.1f;
00056     bmd->res = 1;
00057     bmd->flags = 0;
00058     bmd->val_flags = 0;
00059     bmd->lim_flags = 0;
00060     bmd->e_flags = 0;
00061     bmd->bevel_angle = 30;
00062     bmd->defgrp_name[0] = '\0';
00063 }
00064 
00065 static void copyData(ModifierData *md, ModifierData *target)
00066 {
00067     BevelModifierData *bmd = (BevelModifierData*) md;
00068     BevelModifierData *tbmd = (BevelModifierData*) target;
00069 
00070     tbmd->value = bmd->value;
00071     tbmd->res = bmd->res;
00072     tbmd->flags = bmd->flags;
00073     tbmd->val_flags = bmd->val_flags;
00074     tbmd->lim_flags = bmd->lim_flags;
00075     tbmd->e_flags = bmd->e_flags;
00076     tbmd->bevel_angle = bmd->bevel_angle;
00077     BLI_strncpy(tbmd->defgrp_name, bmd->defgrp_name, sizeof(tbmd->defgrp_name));
00078 }
00079 
00080 static CustomDataMask requiredDataMask(Object *UNUSED(ob), ModifierData *md)
00081 {
00082     BevelModifierData *bmd = (BevelModifierData *)md;
00083     CustomDataMask dataMask = 0;
00084 
00085     /* ask for vertexgroups if we need them */
00086     if (bmd->defgrp_name[0]) dataMask |= CD_MASK_MDEFORMVERT;
00087 
00088     return dataMask;
00089 }
00090 
00091 #define EDGE_MARK   1
00092 
00093 #ifdef USE_BM_BEVEL_OP_AS_MOD
00094 
00095 /* BMESH_TODO
00096  *
00097  * this bevel calls the operator which is missing many of the options
00098  * which the bevel modifier in trunk has.
00099  * - no vertex bevel
00100  * - no weight bevel
00101  *
00102  * These will need to be added to the bmesh operator.
00103  *       - campbell
00104  *
00105  * note: this code is very close to MOD_edgesplit.c.
00106  * note: if 0'd code from trunk included below.
00107  */
00108 static DerivedMesh *applyModifier(ModifierData *md, struct Object *UNUSED(ob),
00109                                   DerivedMesh *dm,
00110                                   int UNUSED(useRenderParams),
00111                                   int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00112 {
00113     DerivedMesh *result;
00114     BMesh *bm;
00115     BMEditMesh *em;
00116     BMIter iter;
00117     BMEdge *e;
00118     BevelModifierData *bmd = (BevelModifierData*) md;
00119     float threshold = cos((bmd->bevel_angle + 0.00001) * M_PI / 180.0);
00120 
00121     em = DM_to_editbmesh(dm, NULL, FALSE);
00122     bm = em->bm;
00123 
00124     BM_mesh_normals_update(bm, FALSE);
00125     BMO_push(bm, NULL);
00126 
00127     if (bmd->lim_flags & BME_BEVEL_ANGLE) {
00128         BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00129             /* check for 1 edge having 2 face users */
00130             BMLoop *l1, *l2;
00131             if ( (l1= e->l) &&
00132                  (l2= e->l->radial_next) != l1)
00133             {
00134                 if (dot_v3v3(l1->f->no, l2->f->no) < threshold) {
00135                     BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, EDGE_MARK);
00136                 }
00137             }
00138         }
00139     }
00140     else {
00141         /* crummy, is there a way just to operator on all? - campbell */
00142         BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00143             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, EDGE_MARK);
00144         }
00145     }
00146 
00147     BMO_op_callf(bm, "bevel geom=%fe percent=%f use_even=%b use_dist=%b",
00148                  EDGE_MARK, bmd->value, (bmd->flags & BME_BEVEL_EVEN) != 0, (bmd->flags & BME_BEVEL_DIST) != 0);
00149     BMO_pop(bm);
00150 
00151     BLI_assert(em->looptris == NULL);
00152     result = CDDM_from_BMEditMesh(em, NULL, TRUE, FALSE);
00153     BMEdit_Free(em);
00154     MEM_freeN(em);
00155 
00156     return result;
00157 }
00158 
00159 
00160 #else /* from trunk, see note above */
00161 
00162 static DerivedMesh *applyModifier(ModifierData *md, Object *UNUSED(ob),
00163                         DerivedMesh *derivedData,
00164                         int UNUSED(useRenderParams),
00165                         int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00166 {
00167     DerivedMesh *result;
00168     BMEditMesh *em;
00169 
00170     /*bDeformGroup *def;*/
00171     int /*i,*/ options, defgrp_index = -1;
00172     BevelModifierData *bmd = (BevelModifierData*) md;
00173 
00174     options = bmd->flags | bmd->val_flags | bmd->lim_flags | bmd->e_flags;
00175 
00176 #if 0
00177     if ((options & BME_BEVEL_VWEIGHT) && bmd->defgrp_name[0]) {
00178         defgrp_index = defgroup_name_index(ob, bmd->defgrp_name);
00179         if (defgrp_index < 0) {
00180             options &= ~BME_BEVEL_VWEIGHT;
00181         }
00182     }
00183 #endif
00184 
00185     em = DM_to_editbmesh(derivedData, NULL, FALSE);
00186     BME_bevel(em, bmd->value, bmd->res, options, defgrp_index, DEG2RADF(bmd->bevel_angle), NULL, FALSE);
00187     BLI_assert(em->looptris == NULL);
00188     result = CDDM_from_BMEditMesh(em, NULL, TRUE, FALSE);
00189     BMEdit_Free(em);
00190     MEM_freeN(em);
00191 
00192     /* until we allow for dirty normal flag, always calc,
00193      * note: calculating on the CDDM is faster then the BMesh equivalent */
00194     CDDM_calc_normals(result);
00195 
00196     return result;
00197 }
00198 
00199 #endif
00200 
00201 static DerivedMesh *applyModifierEM(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00202                         struct BMEditMesh *UNUSED(editData),
00203                         DerivedMesh *derivedData)
00204 {
00205     return applyModifier(md, ob, derivedData, 0, 1);
00206 }
